alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Gilmer; Murray; Union (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 9:57PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gilmer, northern Murray, northwestern Union and Fannin Counties through 1045 PM EST... At 956 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from the Cohutta Wilderness to Conasauga Lake to near Chatsworth, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Chatsworth, Blue Ridge, Eton, Morganton, Hemp, Jones Mill, Higdon, Nottely Dam, Hurst, Ivy Log, Loving, Jones Creek, Cohutta Wilderness, Epworth, Dial, Conasauga Lake, Mineral Bluff, Cherry Log, Mountaintown and Fort Mountain State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
